rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A small lobby that aligns with Vastu guidelines, ensuring a welcoming energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern minimalist kitchen design following local building norms, with efficient work triangle and proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space for living activities that incorporates natural light and Vastu principles of balance.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Spacious dining area near the living room and kitchen for a cohesive space.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom with a spacious balcony attached.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Principal master bedroom with ample space and a private balcony, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional master bedroom with a spacious balcony and integrated closet space.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom ensuring functional use of space with an attached balcony.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom designed for additional space with a balcony to enhance natural lighting.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Dedicated service area for storage and utilities, ensuring compliance with local building norms.

openings.name: Front Entrance
openings.description: Main entrance aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

openings.name: Side Entrance
openings.description: Secondary entrance providing easy access to the garden and service area.

openings.name: Balcony Openings
openings.description: Each bedroom has a spacious balcony designed for relaxation and improved natural ventilation.
